magnum.name: MAGNUM
features: Build a large amount of credit with a low monthly payment
Build $2,000 to $30,000 of installment credit history
Designed to build large credit – not savings
magnum.price_des_head: Average FICO® Score 8 increase of 86 points
magnum.price_des: in 12 months for MAGNUM 10000 accountholders with a starting credit score of 550 or less, for all accounts opened in 2021 with 12 or more months of account activity that made 12 on-time payments.

revolv.name: Revolv
revolv.description: Fastest way to establish and improve credit
features: Build up to $3,000 of revolving credit
Revolv can rapidly improve your credit utilization – and score
$99 per year – NO monthly payment required
revolv.price_des_head: Average FICO® Score 8 increase of 62 points
revolv.price_des: for Revolv accountholders with a starting credit score under 550 who opened an account in Q1 2023 and made optional monthly savings payments between $15 and $45.

instal.name: Instal
instal.description: Entry level account for new builders
features: Balances building credit with building savings
Build up to $1,100 of installment credit
instal.price_des_head: Average FICO® Score 8 increase of 45 points
instal.price_des: for Instal/CS Max accountholders with a starting credit score under 550 who opened an account in Q1 2023 and made at least 3 on-time payments.

signin.title: Transform your life with stronger credit

terms.title: IMPORTANT INFORMATION ABOUT PROCEDURES FOR OPENING A NEW ACCOUNT:
terms.description: To help the government fight the funding of terrorism and money laundering activities, and the theft of your identity, Federal law requires all financial institutions to obtain, verify, and record information that identifies each person who opens an account. What this means for you: When you open an account, we will ask for your name, address, tax identification number (social security number or employer identification number), date of birth, and possibly other information that will allow us to identify you. We may also ask to see your driver's license or other identifying documents.

signup.copyright: © %COPY_RIGHT% Austin Capital Bank SSB. All Rights Reserved.

step1.title: Hello
step1.description: We  need a few details to get you started.

step2.title: Date of Birth
step2.description: You must be 18 years or older to open a Credit Bolt account.

step4.title: Personal Home Address
step4.description: Credit Bolt account are only available to resident of the US.

step5.title: Password
step5.description: Secure your account by creating a unique password.

password.title: Minimum Requirements:
password.uppercaseLower: Upper and lower case letters (e.g. A a)

step1.title: Identity
step1.description: Federal regulations require us to verify your Social Security Number. This won't affect your credit score.

step2.title: Verify Your Info
step2.description: We use this info to report your payment history and build your credit with the credit bureaus.

payment.title: Payment
payment.description: To active your Credit Builder Account and begin building your credit, you will need to select a monthly Payment Method and pay annual Membership Fee of $99 today.

checking.title: Use your checking account
checking.description: Search for your Financial Institution and login to your account.

card.title: Use a debit card
card.description: Each payment subject to Convenience Fee of $0.30 plus 2.99% of the payment.

welcome.title: Welcome Back!
